E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Then place the thumb at the top of the hand; and let it rest against the palm so that your work is visible, because it is a delicate and small operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	Then insert the hook into the hairline, adjusting it so that it does not hurt; and let it penetrate the eyelid quickly before removing the hair from the natural line.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Then pull out the hair completely and insert it into the pinhole; let the hairs be one, two or three at most; no more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	And then pull your hand towards that inner part where hair has grown out from the eyelid by the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If it is not pulled out but the hair remains, you will pull it out with the tweezers that you have prepared there, because if it is pulled out from above, it will cause a wound.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And take that away with the vision of the heel because if you pull it out, the tweezers will hurt, and when you remove it, the wound will be clean, and leave it closed for two or three days, so that hair does not adhere to the place where it has been removed. and a good wound appears there.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	If the hair is too short, then you should take a long hair from your natural hair and raise it up to that place, or you leave it inside where it is longer, and then you raise it up.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	Of the cure of the eye that is in the eyelid.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When the eye is inflamed and contracted in its eyelid, or to the right or left part, because of a bad consolidation of plague or of a section or of a cauterization, it is called leporine, and this is either natural or accidental, and is done by a consolidation of plague or of sections or of cauterization, or by similarity to their bad effects.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The way to do the operation is that you cut that consolidation and separate the lips, and pause in it what is between those two a strip of cloth, and tie them up so that they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And do not know if you use the cure of it from the causes that dry up, tighten; for if you make water return to be inflamed, it is worse than nothing at all while burning it.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use in it from causes that soften thus with fenugrec, and immerse in the water in which there are cow's milk and salt of lime, or apply dandelion, which is dissolved in some oil, and dip the strip into that water, and treat with that.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the treasure of your cure is that you perform all what is not consolidated according to the form that it burns at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	This operation which we have said is not anything but a correction of inflammation that does not return to the form of the place according to what it burns in front.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter XIV.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	Of the cure of inflammation that is made in the lower eyelid.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This cure which is made in the lower eyelid, which is called by name inflammation; and it is either natural or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	It may also be accidental because of plague, or because of a section, or because of cauterization, or for other similar reasons.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	And the way to do that operation is that you take a needle which has double thread, and put it through the flesh, and let it go through the lacrimal bone from the left through the lacrimal bone from the right, so that the thread reaches both extremities of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then return the flesh to its original state with the needle and cut it with the blade widely.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	Then if it returns to its form according to what it covers, so is it; and if not, take the thread and hold it on the split, and make the two holes in the center of the eyelid, and tie them up.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	The two extremities of the two splits should be at different angles to the incision, which you have made where they meet, and may also be a different figure from them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	This shape is a Greek letter: alpha.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	Then return that flesh to its original amount because of the width of it taken from that side, which closes the eyelid.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust those parts that are separated and sew them up with the wool thread; then treat those with water what we have said about the medicinal medicines and baths within which they are healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	If the inflammation is made through a split or stitch or cauterization, then it is necessary that you cut the flat split on the hair of the eyelid according to what comes before.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	Then separate those two lips according to what we have said.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the summary of the speech about the cure of inflammation that is in the lower eyelid or the upper eyelid, which runs in the operation, according to what it is prepared in the form of inflammation, and that is in a form of different shapes.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled person always prepares it in any way that is possible within it to return the form to the natural shape, or close to that, and that bad one according to what suits it from the operation and of the instruments in the best conditions.
Capitol .xv.	Chapter XV.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	Of the adhesion of the eyelid to the conjunctiva or to the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation happens to a few men because the eyelid is glued above the edge of the eyeball, and not allowed the ease of movement or its natural functions, then when you insert the tip of the needle into the lower eyelid, raise it up or extend it with the thread.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	Then you cut the adhesion with a thin blade, which is not on the sharpness of the incisions, while gently holding the bad one away from the eye so that it does not disturb the operation, and remove the blade which does not damage the eyeball to its sharpness.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	That is your incision which easily removes that adhesion so that the eyelid is returned to its original form, and all the adhesion is healed.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	Then you put in the eye salt water which you wash with; or distill in it the water of Zuni dissolved in water.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Then separate the eyelid from the eye with a calva of it, and place on the eye wool infused with album of water, and then the third day use causes that consolidate according to what is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Chapter XVI.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	Of the incision of the eyelid and of the prominence of the lacrimal bone.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that the eyelid is according to two ways, because either it is nervous, and it is similar to hard glass thin; or it is not nervous, it is like frozen water, which, when you touch it, or it is forced to take a thread, it is severed and the thread does not stick to it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both spices do not begin except from the lacrimal bone, which goes little by little, so that it covers the eye, and stops the light and the movement of the eye.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The way to do the operation with the incision is that the bad one pauses his head in the middle position, and then opens its eyelids, and raises the eyelid towards your hand, and then pick up the needle with two thread twists, and extend those two holes from the center of the eye, and tie them up.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	Then take a needle and insert it into that hair of the animal or cow or goat's milk or others, or of similar things, or of a strong faith, or double the end of the needle little by little and keep it in the middle of the eyelid, and pass the thread through the needle, and tie it with a knot at the tip of the eyelid; then remove that hair from the edge of the eyelid which closes the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	Then you keep that hair inside according to what is behind it.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	Then you cut the rim of the lacrimal bone with a sharp blade or small scissors, and remove the flesh of the natural lacrimal bone so that it does not cause continuous tears by cutting it from the inside.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And sometimes cut the eyelid with a long thread or with faith, and then separate it with a sharp blade which is the form of this.
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And beware that you do not touch the translucent membrane (the "tunica cornea") with the spatula; nor let it enter in any way in the rupture; and that the pupil is punctured.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then bring the incision up to the heel a little salt water or very fine ash and let it enter again another day; then treat that which is inside with water so that it may be healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the nail is not nervous and you cannot get the needle into it, or if it is attached to that leg, then treat this kind of nail with medicines, and heal it thus with oil and vinegar in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	If you want to cut that off, then open the heel of the patient and take a thin spatula with a sharp edge according to this form:
am subtilitat.	in subtility.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	and if that is rarefied and confined and enters in that way, then distil from your own heel in the morning with very fine ash or salt water, and let the heel be inside for another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the operation on that again until it is all better; unless the opposite happens, that is, cauterize [it] in the heel because then when you leave it, treat the cauterization at first so that it may be healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation on that with reason until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The removal of the lacrimal bone, if you see great harm in it in the heel, shall be suspended with an ounce; and cut off a piece from that one, and do not cut off all the incision so that it does not cut off the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	Then distil in the lacrimal heel with fine ash  [and] morning medicine until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter 17.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Of the incision of algarrobate and of that which is born of meat attached to the heel.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Some in the heels of the eye is born meat that is tender, and it lies close to the pupil, or approaches or sticks to the eyelids; it presses the eyelids together as though they were pilastres and is joined to the cheekbones.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	The operation on it is that the patient rests his head on the pillow; then open the heels of that one and collect all that meat with a sharp knife, and with water; and with a forceps or a hook; then cut off that meat at first so that all is finished with the incision, and beware of the heel that you do not tear it to pieces your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And be your incision that with which you cut those or the spatula that we have recalled in the incision of the nail; or with small forceps according to which one comes, and treat it thus as soon as the form of it arrives.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Then when your incision is complete and all that meat is removed, then fill the heel with salt water; or distil in it powder that resembles medicine corrosive, and place it on the heel upside down with an egg-album [drip] so that it is secured from the cauterization.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	If any reason of algarrobate is present and it has become infected with sand [dirt], and you fear cauterization; then leave the heel alone and heal that cauterization with water which will soften that cauterization, and repeat your operation on that again until it is healed, and shape the meat in the heel of this kind.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, you must know that if any cure for the heel is removed by natural or accidental means, then it will be cured with iron, and do not put your hand in any of these operations unless you see that the member is suffering from those operations.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter 18.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	Of the collection of the sweat in the heel.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Swallow then the red veins that are dry on the heel and do not allow your operation to happen, and leave the heel for a long time of days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Then it is necessary at the beginning that you consider whether the heel in which the sweat is present is firm and there is not another illness that is present as a sweat; then collect that sweat.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And it is that you order the patient to rest his head on the pillow; then suspend those veins with an ounce or two according to your prudence; and let that ounce be of subtle duplicate according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two ounces of subtlety in one part according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	Then let those veins be collected with subtle forceps, with subtlety, and abstain from washing that sand for an hour; then let those veins be removed from the heel so that they are dried up by the heel and are scattered.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And beware that you do not wash the heel with the tips of the spatula; and if your operation is in the morning before the sun, and be firm in your operation so that you do not cut off those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you are finished, then distil in the heel with green or bitter medicine so that the sweat is dried up by it.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	If water is not available to you then collect all of it within that hour; and then let it be applied to the heel with water which will soften the pain in it, and let it rest for several days so that the pain in it is cured and secured from the cauterization.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat on it according to the same way until it is healed.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the shape of the forceps:
Capitol .xix.	Chapter 19.
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	Of reduction of inflammation to the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat inflammation with cauterization or acute medicine as it is preceded in the narration of it and is not cured, then do not render it to dust but take out all the moisture that is in it so that the bone may be discovered; and let it be covered with a poultice.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And then, when the bone is discovered and also in its corruption or blackness, then you use a instrument of which this is the form:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	It is called a sharp cap, and it is made of iron, and it is the cap that is used to pierce with a point of lime or to cut with a subtle point (in this case as it is in the following form).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	Then place that above the location of the corrupted part of the bone, and turn it between your thumb and fingers; press your hand little by little until you know that that corruption is smooth.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	Then water is made to dry up some time; and then restore the location with caustic and stiff substances.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	Then if the location is consolidated and it is hidden good meat and it is separated from the sinew of the skin and it is not renewed and it does not become infected and it does not happen in it, then you know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	If not, then do not render it to dust but reduce the fracture to the form of the nose, and according to this way: and if you discover a second bone with iron or acerbic medicine, and after discovering the bone, then take a tribe according to this form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	The length of iron is folded, and its edge is sharp within the extreme end as often as possible.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	Then place that above the bone, and let it be near the lacrimal; then make your hand move a little from the tribe until it enters all the bone, and that one feels the patient by contact that he has it:
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the location with caustic medicine as if you were drying it up.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Then when the meat does not endure that location, then the matter that makes the parts come together returns to the nose; then water is applied to the patient.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter .xx.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of the hernia from the navel.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the hernia has come away completely and causes no harm or decrease, then remove the patient's clothing, and immediately thereafter, follow with the next step, and pause to apply a cooling liquid to the navel which has been prepared with salt and aloe and oil and collyrium, and immediately afterwards to tighten the plaster over the hernia with powder.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the manner of the powder is that you take linen cloths made from lions' fur, and each cloth be doubled up into four sheets; and make them of this fur.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	Then arrange those sheets one on top of the other according to the quantity that the hernia requires.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	Then tighten those sheets firmly and securely; then apply the cooling liquid to the navel a second time for its scraping; then remove the sheets and let the patient remain naked all night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	Maybe if, in the meantime, the ligament has become soft, then tighten it tightly.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	Then remove the ligature all at once with a single stroke after having let the patient remain naked all night.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if the hernia has already been reduced, then do so; and if not, then repeat the plastering with the powder and the tightening and the cooling all at once until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter .xxi.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the incision of the hernia in the upper part of the eye.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When the hernia breaks out in the upper part of the eye, and it is large and protuberant, then make an incision with a razor there, and the operation is as follows: you introduce the blade into the root of the eyelid from which the tear duct emerges, and immediately afterwards insert another blade, which has a double-edged blade at one end, in the same way; then let that penetrate and leave the first blade according to its position; then cut the spot of the double blade and pull it back with the blade; then tighten that.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Then remove the blade and place it over the navel, infused with milk of soya, and leave it in place until the thread pulls on the eye.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then treat the hernia with a remedy that comforts it within so that the plague is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And in some cases, from the entire eyelid, a circle of cloth is applied over the navel with tight pressure; and it should be pierced by a fine needle that enters the base of the hernia, and let the watery pus run out, and lower the navel and enter as far as possible.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	Then tighten it until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter .xxii.
De curacio de alconati.	On the treatment of eye troubles.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This disease, which is called "conjitival" (eye trouble), does not exist; it is the navel that resembles descending water and is not that.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	Maybe the manner of the work in it is that you make the navel cut in half and turn it, and immediately take the sixth part of the six eyes (two) and close them so that you cannot see; then let the light shine on them, and the navel should not go down, and do not allow tears to flow, and look at the causes there.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not go down, you will know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	Maybe if it is not prepared to descend the disease with water that we have mentioned, then make the navel cut between the muscles and immediately take a fine needle and pierce it at the place where the conjunctiva meets the corneal nerve in the crown (at the edge of the eye), and let the disease be removed.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Then, when it is removed, you distil the navel with water that has been mixed with honey or with water in which you have built fennel and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	Then let it be cured with other remedies so that it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter .xxii.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On the treatment of water that descends from the navel.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have mentioned the spices for the water in the division and how it agrees to pierce with sound, declaring, then according to health.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then you will know that it is water that should be made into a half-circle and turned on a flat stone; then take the sixth part of the six eyes (two) and close them so they cannot see; then place the stone on the navel and tighten it.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Then pause near the eyelid of the navel with your left hand, if the water is in the navel; or with your right hand, if the water is on the navel.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	Then with your right hand take some almagge, if the navel is left-handed; or with your left hand, if the navel is right-handed.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	Then pause the end of the almagge near the crown by the thickness of the eye's white part from the tear duct, and immediately dip it in almagge with power and turn it; then take it with your hand and dip it again.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	Then penetrate into the navel's white part and feel that almagge has already reached the eye disease.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	Then the measure of the path of almagge to the eye is the space from the pupil to the end of the blackness, and it is the crown of the navel; for you will see with that pupil through the clarity of the corneal layer.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	Then pause almagge in the place where the water is; and then take another one with you, and if the water descends quickly, then treat the navel with that water.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	Then pause for a little while; and if the water descends quickly, then you should stop that other one before almagge is removed.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And when it stops and does not go down, then extract almagge easily, and turn it with your hand slowly, and dissolve a little clear salt in gems and wash the navel inside; then pause the navel outside with cloth or stop it or wrap it in rose water infused with milk of soya, and place it in a clean place.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	Maybe we are those who have not been born yet; and let us pause on that navel with a three-part meal made from milk of soya.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	If you do not obey your almagge to the navel in its hardness  — for it is some of those people whose navel is hard like the wood; then, when you take the needle:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	Then pierce that conjunctiva with the needle, and do not stop until you reach the navel; and if it does not stop, then you should draw blood from it.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	Then put almagge as we have mentioned.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	You should be pleased with this work, prepared for the navel' sleep; and let it not go out during the night; and let no movement occur there.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	Then pause in the nature of the water so that its nature is cool; and do not pull the hair from the front or back of all.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	Then the plaster should be according to its position by the third day.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	Then remove that navel from that dark place and expose the painful sight; then return the plaster on the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And it is not necessary to make water in the time of treatment or immediately thereafter, but rather to infuse it.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	While you are making water for the navel, because the water spreads quickly with a look of contempt.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	Maybe if an apoplexy occurs suddenly, then remove the navel on the seventh day, and immediately afterwards, clean it with water that causes an apoplexy.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Then turn him over so he is facing down on his back and pause for a moment above the face of the patient to whom you are treating, as it is kept in place by the hands that hold his feet.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	And now go back to the dark room gradually and converse with him about his causes.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And you know that in surgery it is not allowed to have a cold eye, and so turn your gaze sharply toward the operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And some have said that it is done in the art of medicine, and one says that fire is made by rubbing together two pieces of wood and then adding a spark, and water is drawn out.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But nevertheless I have not seen in our land the one who has perfected this water, nor is it known from the ancient books, and it is possible that this is new.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	These are the forms of magic for those who are on those who do not know about them:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	And they have been made from iron or steel, and the tips of those are this triangular subtility, the acute tip thus being the shape.
Capitol .xxiv.	Chapter .xxiv.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Of the treatment for meat in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose various meats are hidden that have caused a condition that is gathered by wind and weight, or it is a polyps that looks like this disease represented by a peal.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And of the meat is cancerous flesh, with white skin, and it is that meat of a lion not of white color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Then in those meats of a lion that are neither fraudulent nor cancerous, cover it with your hand and place it under the sun, and pierce the meat with a sharp knife into those pieces.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then remove that piece from the sides beforehand, and cut it into small pieces with a sharp knife so that you know all the meat is removed; if for any reason the removal can be done easily, then cut that meat into smaller pieces with one of the small instruments.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	If it is a sore or acid pus, then pause the meat that covers it; or if it is a malicious pus, then cut and cauterize that within which has been cut off sore and all holes have been covered.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	Then return to the nose to take the incision with salt and water or vinegar.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	If the nose is wet and you feel moisture within the palate, then you know that it is already healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	If the moisture does not penetrate according to how it is covered, then you know that inside there is no meat but only pus and bones of the nostrils in which there has been no removal.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Then return to the nose to test it with your finger, and taste each piece of meat a little at a time, and place a sharp tool on the tip of the finger or on another cause that can be done easily; cut off one end of the tissue in the nose with a tool.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And when the meat is done cooking, so that its odor is drawn in and enters the nostrils, and it is thrown up on the palate because the sight of this action causes children to vomit at school, which is a good sign for those who want to do it.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then pause the two ends of the tissue, one end that comes out above the nose and the other that is still inside the nose, and then remove the meat from the nostrils that is on the finger, and cut it into pieces so that you know that the meat is already gone; it is done.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then remove the tissue, and return to the nose to take the incision of sore a little at a time, and do it for three days or more until the wound is healed completely; cut off all the meat.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	Then return to the end of the cause, place a pipe in the nose for drainage over time until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	If you see that treatment has begun, then use it.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	And this is the form of the instrument to cut and clean with which oils and medicines are distilled in the nose:
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	It is made of silver or iron, which looks like a small open lantern, and it has a sharp point, and the meat looks similar.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you want, make a closed canula like this with a tube, and the tube of the instrument to cut and clean is flat and open; hold it in your hand, so that you hold it when you drain oil or water from the suckings and the foul-smelling causes.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	And these are the most precious instruments: take from beaver, from white balsam, from ginger, and from goldene plums, from long pepper, from sage, and from eptima spice, and from anise seed. And put it together with blood and a cauldron, and make pills, and one pill be taken with warm water, and return them to the nose when they are ready.
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter .xxv.
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	Of the treatment of the nostrils at their ends.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	A few drops of oil are placed in the nostrils at their ends, and it is great and prolonged for three days within which time it is seen that treatment begins with the watchful eye.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And through oil that you cover it in the beginning of its appearance, and you will inherit all of it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	Then pause over the place or cauterize or apply a burning medicine that is on the spot.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	If the incision is delayed until it is great, then consider if it is hard and of white color and of little feeling, then do not touch that piece with iron because it is a cranky apium; because drops of oil are placed on this apium by the great evil that has been done to it.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	If the apium is hard and its color is not pale, then when incision can be done on all of it, then remove the meat with a sharp instrument and cure the spot with oil that has begun to heal and apply pressure within which it is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter .xxvi.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	Of the suture of the nose and of the lips and of the ear when the continuity is broken by plague or by resemblance.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	You know that when you achieve resolution of continuity in one of these cartilage structures, you have less success with the operation than with others.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then, when this condition is present in any of them, you should consider if it is a fresh plague with the same name, then adjust the two lips of the plague to the suture, and then return to heal that within which has been healed.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	If the lips of the solution for continuity are already separated, and each is healed separately, then you know that they have been cut apart, within which does not cause any pain.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two lips to the suture and strengthen them, and spray on them dragon's blood and honey-mustard, and pause over the powder a little of turpentine oil, or another of the consolidative plasters, and leave it alone for two days or three, then remove that plaster and replace it with another one, and you will leave it alone for a few days, and then return to heal that within which has been healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	If the method of the suture is that you add the solution for continuity or with needles in the same way as you have described in the suture of the belly, or if you add the solution for continuity to the tissue.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter .xxvii.
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	Of the extraction of those causes that come in the two lips separated inside.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	Here is the first sentence of the text:
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Then if you cut the lips and separate each of those hard pieces from all parts, and clean the wound with sage tea until it is completely healed, and then wash it thoroughly with water that is made bitter, and clean the area with astringent, then heal it.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter .xxviii.
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	On cutting into the flesh between the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	And if dark spots appear on the flesh between the gums, which cause whiteness in some people, then you should hang that piece of flesh or cut it off and clean out those parts with a needle and thread, and let the blood flow or stop the bleeding.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then apply sage tea or other astringent or Exfoliant powder to the area.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns, then cut it again and cauterize it, because the cauterization will not be effective otherwise.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter.xxix.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	On the reason for teeth made of iron.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When the surface of the teeth, between the gums and in the threads, is rough, sharp, and some spots are dark and others are yellow or green, then the gums rot and the teeth fall out.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	Then if you cut the meat between your teeth and place the top of the foot in the space below, and grind the teeth where those spots appear, which resemble sand, then the blackness and yellowness and other spots will disappear because they are not caused by anything that grinds them.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	Then if that is the reason for those spots at the beginning of hair growth, then that is right; and if not, then you should repeat the process on another day or a second or third time until you arrive at the final statement concerning what you want to say.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	And you should know that teeth require different shapes and forms of tools according to how they are prepared for your operation.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And for this reason, the blade with which the tooth is cut from the gum is different from the blade used to cut between the teeth according to other forms, and those forms of blades should be prepared, which you will see soon enough:
Capitol .xxx.	Chapter.xxx.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	Root removal of teeth.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Then if you cure the tooth from its root, taking care not to wait too long for the complete eradication of it, because it is a sublimated substance and an excuse in the eradication of the root.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	And if the meat is forced out, then you should be certain which tooth hurts, because the pain of the root may deceive you and make you think that it is in a healthy tooth, and you will eradicate that one, and the pain will not stop until the root itself is eradicated, for we have seen this happen through an operation on the teeth of the lower jaw.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	Then you should be certain which tooth hurts, and you know that well, then if you scrape on the path of the tooth with a blade where there is no benefit, until it is dissolved from the gum at the beginning, and then cut it with tiny scissors or a sharp fork little by little until it is cut off.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	And then place a strong tenaculum firmly on the bottom of the teeth that you can pull without hurting yourself, and place the top of the foot between those teeth that hurt you less, and take hold of the tooth with a firm grip according to how it should not break, nor should the root hurt you.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And if it is not root-get (i.e., the tooth has come loose), then take one of those instruments, and insert it carefully from all sides with ease and try to remove it easily as if it were being pulled out at the beginning.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	But if the tooth is loose or corroded, then you should wrap that cloth tightly around it and tighten it with a string at the end of a small stick so that it does not break in your hand when you tighten it.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	Then if you open it exceptionally by cutting into the gum all around, and guard your strength so that you do not break it and cause a rupture in it, and return to the foot for the evil that is less than the first pain of it.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	And be careful not to make a mess of it like some careless and audacious barbers have done at the end of their shaving, for we have witnessed that with those roots removed completely, or some of them, or if you extract one with some bones from the mandible in this way, with those ugly spots we have seen.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	Then the eradication of it should be washed with a strong cauterizer or astringent solution.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	And if there is blood from the tooth, as it often happens with those spots, then pour a small amount of water on it and sprinkle it with salt, or cauterize it.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the tweezers and forceps should be small and sharp at the end, with a long handle, and a short grip, so that they do not bend when you work with them.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	They should be like this, sometimes with large grips, so that when you start using them they do not bend, they are sharp tips.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	They are made of iron from India, with a right-hand grip, and at the end are teeth like those of an owl's beak which is sharp and pointed, and some of these ends are the shape of a bird's beak, which is a handle, and they are very strong in their grip.
Capitol .xxxi.	Chapter.xxxi.
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	On the eradication of teeth and the removal of bones from the mandible.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you should eradicate a tooth that is being pulled out for any reason, then if the place is moistened with a cold liquid for a day or two until it softens; and then place a tenaculum firmly on each side of the location with a blade, and place a pair of forceps at the end of one of them, like an owl's beak, which is a handle, the shape of the tweezers:
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	Their ends are sharp from inside, with five or six teeth, and they are made of iron or metal.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if you do not obey your instructions with these tweezers or forceps, then cut off the root and dig out the instrument which has the name of an awl, so is a small hammer whose shape is as follows:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And be of a small thick end of tar, that it not be enveloped by it so that it does not break.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	So that if for this the root is pierced, it is good; and if not, help me with these other instruments whose are the shapes: the shape of the first instrument is of triangular end in which there is some thickness:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The shape of the second instrument is that it be of triangular and very thin end.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And you are helped with this instrument having two ramps of which this is the form to follow:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	And with other instruments that will be needed in sharpening of teeth; because quickly it is done with this instrument which is assembled of one large, and this is the form:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	of the triangular end bent or short, which is some thickness, and that it not be enveloped by it so that it does not break.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And you know that the instruments of the teeth are similar to the other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	Might the artisans skilled and subtle in art, invent for themselves according to what it means to them that operation and various illnesses; because are of the illnesses to which the ancient did not say or stopped their own instrument, by the shapes of different species.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	If the bone of the jaw or other bones of the mouth is broken, then let it be cleansed on that in its place with what is convenient to it of the instruments and of the forceps which we have spoken about the extraction of the roots of the teeth, and help me with gestures of which this is the form:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And be in some small thickness little by little, and is stretched or held to the mouth so that it does not escape or flee completely that the bone of all is pierced; and then restore the place with medicines suitable for it.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If in the bone is a small hole, then let that bone be cut from that hole and from its blackness, and cure that within it is healed.
Capitol .xxxii.	Chapter .xxxii.
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	Of the treatment of prominent diseases compared to other diseases.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When the teeth are prominent not following their natural course by those the form is short, and more so when they extend to the gums, and more so to the venerable vulvas; therefore consider that if a tooth is nothing attached to another tooth, and it is not possible to cut it with a saw or to rub it with a file, then pull it out; but if it is not attached to another tooth, then cut it with this instrument of which this is the form: and it is similar to the morra of a pig, and is made of iron of India of triangular end in which there is some thickness.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And be your incision with which you cut that tooth in two days because of the hardness of the tooth, and that it is not attached to any other tooth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if a prominent tooth has spread to a file, then file that tooth with a file of iron of India of which this is the form:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And all of it is made of iron of India and the margin only; and that be very small points made with a file on it, as needles, making the tooth be filed little by little in two days with ease, so that no other tooth becomes attached to it, and it breaks.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And then line up that tooth, and cut it with a scalpel.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if a tooth is broken in which one part is sharp and you are cutting it with the tongue, then consider that you rub out the sharpness of that fraction so that the tongue does not scrape nor the word corrupt.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter.xxxiii.
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	Of restoration of broken teeth with gold or silver wire.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When an accident happens to the teeth by striking or hitting, and the patient cannot be restrained more than that it bleeds, and you have treated that with medicinal stinging, and your treatment has not been successful, then for those teeth that are attached to gold wire and not to silver wire, because silver changes color and must be filed with a file in two days, whereas gold does not change color.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And be the wire in such subtility and thickness according to the quantity that can enter between teeth; and the shape of the cut is that you take the wire and double it between two sound teeth, and then let it grow with two twists of the wire between two broken teeth, or if one or both are missing, until the thread reaches the sound tooth on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then repeat the treatment within the fraction of which you began, and strengthen your hand with ease and skill until it is not broken.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And be your tightening with which you tighten the wire so that the roots of the teeth do not escape.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then you cut off the excess tips of the wire with scissors or tweezers, and add them in any place with gestures, and hide those between the sound tooth and the broken tooth, so that it does not damage the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then let that tooth rest with a string.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	If it is broken or shattered, strengthen it or them with another wire in such a way in all the time.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	This is the shape of teeth and the figure of the cutting of two sound teeth and two broken teeth, thus tied:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when one tooth or two return to their place in the place of each in their locations, and they are restored thus with a string tied, and they remain.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	It is not done except by skilled and wise artisans.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	Some teeth are apt for some cause of the bones of the cow, and it is done from them as the form of a tooth, and is placed in its place in which the tooth fails, and it is strengthened thus with what we have said, and remain and serve to that for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter.xxxiv.
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Of the incision of the ligature which is seen in the tongue and prohibits speaking.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament which leaves the tongue some times or is natural to the person who does not have it, or happens by accident due to a plague which has already been consolidated.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	The operation in it is that you work the mouth of the patient, and its tongue exists in the neck; and it lifts up the tongue, and then cut the ligament with a sharp scalpel according to the thickness so that the tongue does not feel its edge.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	If in that is some hardness or pain, and it has been standing for consolidation of disease, then you cut it once and cut it according to the thickness so that you do not break the ligament and dissolve the nodule.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And guard that there is not made a crack in the bone of the meat, and you cut here flesh with a sharp knife and avoid flowing blood.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	And then wash the trace of the incision with clear water or with salt water or with clean water; and then let it rest away from the tongue; so is made the which leaves the tongue in any new way that it does not become consolidated again.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	If an accident of blood happens, place over the place a tri-edged knife; if the blood runs, then sterilize the place with a sterilizing liquid which is suitable for this work and pour it.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And that tooth is cured with other causes so that it is healed.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter.xxxv.
De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	Of the extraction of a tongue.
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Some times happens by accident leaving the tongue swollen, resembling a small one, preventing the tongue from its natural operation; and it is strong that is made to fit into the mouth.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	And the operation on him is that you make an incision in the patient’s groin 60 degrees from the sun, and examine the abscess.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	And if you see that it is black or brown in color, which the patient does not feel, do not touch it because it is hard.
